headline: Hewlett Packard Enterprise (NYSE:HPE) Sees 20% Price Drop Following Disappointing Earnings Guidance
summary: Hewlett Packard Enterprise (NYSE:HPE) experienced a significant share price decline of 20% over the last week, primarily due to issuing disappointing earnings guidance for the current quarter and fiscal year, which suggested lower-than-expected earnings per share. This outlook heavily influenced investor sentiment, despite the company's notable revenue growth in Q1 2025. While the broader market ended the week with another decline, with the S&P 500 dropping 3%, HPE's pronounced drop stands...
